songs.title: When Gloves Come Off
songs.album: Music Inspired by Illumination & Dr. Seuss’ The Grinch
songs.lyrics:
[Ryan Beatty]
Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah
La, la, la, la
La, la, la, la, la
La, la, la, la
When the gloves come off, I sleep
That's when the cold begins to creep (Creep in)
I can't feel my hands
Ahh

[Tyler, the Creator]
Boom, boom, ba-boom
Go down
Back to one (Two)
Yeah
